snippet: SHAPIRO--Daniel. Dan, my beloved sister's husband and our extraordinary brother-in-law has left us much too soon. He was uniquely smart, charming, wise, caring and irreplaceable. We were very lucky and for over 50 years! We send hugs and kisses to Ellen, Jonathan, Andrew, Peter and their families. With deepest love, Jane, Jim, Rob and Liz and families. 1/3
